verses.text: Now \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zelophehad|strong="H6765"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hepher|strong="H2660"\w*, \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w*, \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, belonged \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*. These \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H7126"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*: \w Mahlah|strong="H4244"\w*, \w Noah|strong="H5270"\w*, \w Hoglah|strong="H2295"\w*, \w Milcah|strong="H4435"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Tirzah|strong="H8656"\w*. \w They|strong="H8034"\w* \w approached|strong="H7126"\w*

\w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w entrance|strong="H6607"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Meeting|strong="H4150"\w*, \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, Eleazar \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w leaders|strong="H5387"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* said,

“\w Our|strong="H3068"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* followers \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w gathered|strong="H3259"\w* \w together|strong="H3259"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w Instead|strong="H3588"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* \w sin|strong="H2399"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H5414"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* disappear \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w clan|strong="H4940"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w no|strong="H5414"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*? \w Give|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* property \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w our|strong="H5414"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w*’s \w brothers|strong="H1121"\w*.”
\w So|strong="H7126"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w brought|strong="H7126"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* case \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*,
\w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* answered \w him|strong="H4872"\w*,

“\w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w Zelophehad|strong="H6765"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w correctly|strong="H3651"\w*. \w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w certainly|strong="H5414"\w* must \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w property|strong="H5159"\w* \w as|strong="H3651"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* father’s brothers, \w and|strong="H1323"\w* \w transfer|strong="H5674"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* father’s \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.

Furthermore, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w say|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*, ‘\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w dies|strong="H4191"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* leaves \w no|strong="H1696"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w transfer|strong="H5674"\w* \w his|strong="H3478"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w his|strong="H3478"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*.

If \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w has|strong="H5159"\w* \w no|strong="H5414"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* brothers.

If \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w has|strong="H5159"\w* \w no|strong="H5414"\w* brothers, \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* father’s brothers.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w if|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H5414"\w* \w brothers|strong="H1121"\w*, \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w next|strong="H7138"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w kin|strong="H7138"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w clan|strong="H4940"\w*, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w take|strong="H3423"\w* \w possession|strong="H3423"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*. \w This|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w statutory|strong="H2708"\w* \w ordinance|strong="H4941"\w* \w for|strong="H2708"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.’” Moses Requests a Successor (Deuteronomy 3:23–29)

\w Then|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, “\w Go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Abarim|strong="H5682"\w* \w range|strong="H2088"\w* \f + \fr 27:12 \ft LXX Go up Mount Nebo beyond the Jordan\f* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* land \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w After|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H7200"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w it|strong="H7200"\w*, \w you|strong="H7200"\w* \w too|strong="H1571"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* gathered \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* brother Aaron \w was|strong="H1571"\w*;

\w for|strong="H4325"\w* \w when|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H6942"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* contended \w in|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H6942"\w* \w Wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w Zin|strong="H6790"\w*, \w both|strong="H1992"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w you|strong="H5869"\w* \w rebelled|strong="H4784"\w* \w against|strong="H4784"\w* \w My|strong="H6942"\w* \w command|strong="H6310"\w* \w to|strong="H4325"\w* \w show|strong="H6942"\w* \w My|strong="H6942"\w* \w holiness|strong="H6942"\w* \w in|strong="H6310"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* regarding \w the|strong="H6942"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*.” \w Those|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H6942"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w Meribah|strong="H4809"\w* \f + \fr 27:14 \ft Meribah means quarreling; see Exodus 17:7.\f* \w in|strong="H6310"\w* \w Kadesh|strong="H6946"\w*, \w in|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H6942"\w* \w Wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w Zin|strong="H6790"\w*.
\w So|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* appealed \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*,

“\w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w spirits|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, \w appoint|strong="H6485"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*

\w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w lead|strong="H3318"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w*, \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w*.” Joshua to Succeed Moses (Deuteronomy 31:1–8)

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* replied \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, “\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w lay|strong="H5564"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Have|strong="H5869"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* Eleazar \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w commission|strong="H6680"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*.

Confer \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w some|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w authority|strong="H1935"\w*, \w so|strong="H4616"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* Eleazar \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* seek \w counsel|strong="H7592"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Urim.\f + \fr 27:21 \ft Literally the Lights\f* \w At|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w command|strong="H6310"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*—\w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w entire|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*—\w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w*.”

\w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*. \w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* Eleazar \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*,

\w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w laid|strong="H5564"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w commissioned|strong="H6680"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w instructed|strong="H6680"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.
